trigonometric: No a pili paha i nā loina o ka trigonometry
hana: He aha ka mea i hoʻohana ʻia
kihi: ʻO ka hakahaka ma waena o nā laina ʻelua a i ʻole nā mokulele e hui ana
pili: Loaʻa ka palena like ʻole a i ʻole ka lihi
radiana: ʻO ka ʻāpana o ka huina mokulele e like me ka huina ma ke kikowaena o ka pōʻai i hoʻemi ʻia e kahi arc i like ka lōʻihi me ka radius.
p\u014d\u02bbai \u02bb\u0101pana: He pōʻai me ka radius o 1
sine: ʻO ka ratio o ka lōʻihi o ka ʻaoʻao e kū pono ana i ka huina i hāʻawi ʻia i ka lōʻihi o ka hypotenuse o kahi huinakolu ʻākau.
cosine: ʻO ka ratio o ka ʻaoʻao pili me ka hypotenuse o kahi huinakolu ʻākau
piliki: He laina e hoʻopā aku i kahi pihi ma hoʻokahi kiko
secant: He laina pololei e oki ana i ka piko ma na kiko elua a oi
kumuk\u0101n\u0101wai pythagorean: He pilina koʻikoʻi ma ka geometry Euclidean ma waena o nā ʻaoʻao ʻekolu o ka huinakolu ʻākau
hana manawa: He hana e hana hou ana i kona mau waiwai i na manawa a mau manawa
amplitude: ʻO ka neʻe ʻana a i ʻole ka mamao loa i hoʻoneʻe ʻia e kahi kiko ma ke kino haʻalulu a i ʻole ka nalu
ana degere: ʻO ke ana o kahi kihi ma nā degere, kahi i māhele ʻia ai ka pōʻai piha i 360 degere
